title: France's far-right leader placed under formal investigation
text:
France's far-right leader placed under formal investigation 2:54pm GMT - 01:11 
National Front leader Marine Le Pen has been placed under formal investigation over images she tweeted of Islamic State executions. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
National Front leader Marine Le Pen has been placed under formal investigation over images she tweeted of Islamic State executions. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2I0HdQw
